title: PBE riot points
body:
Hello My Brothers , me and my friends have created a new PBE accounts and when we open the accounts we have 0 riot points and 0 blue essences.
can someone help me know why please???

replies.body: PBE Accounts gets their stipends around 11am usually I believe, but most people need to make sure to play at least one game before their accounts will get hit with currency.
Thanks , but we have played 2games and still nothing .... knowing that loot was disabeld and they were working on a fix don’t know if that’s the reason though
